message.body: Hey mang. Just a shot in the dark, but if you happen to upgrade to the new galaxy s4 & want to sell yr s3 think of me. ...just throwing that out there. Still looking for something to replace my broke ass jawn.
Ooo, alright. I'll definitely let you know.
Don't worry Joe, you can call off the search. After days, No, weeks of intensive nationwide searching, my hat has finally been recovered .....intact! Boy I bet you'll sleep goooood tonight!
Do you have any beach cruiser type saddles lying around?

Possibly. I have a couple beach cruisers in my basement with no wheels so I think there might be a saddle or two lying around either connected to them or in a box. You're welcome to come check if something will work out for you.
Yea, just need a beater for now. I picked up an awesome new tandem today and the back seat is a banana seat that can't really be raised to fit an adult human.
Ok, well yr welcome to poke around. I doubt I have anything nice down there anyway.
Okay cool. When will you be around?
Radical, i shoot you a text around then
I just got stuck with a super shitty job so it looks like I'll be working pretty late.
No worries, certainly not a priority
